article_title: Obamacare Medicare Taxes -- Increasing Your 2013 Tax Bill

article_metadata.description: New Medicare Taxes related to Obamacare apply to taxpayers in 2013 who have certain types of income. This post and Infographic define the two new Medicare Taxes and how they may apply to taxpayers.
article_metadata.author: Holly Magister
